note:
I'm an old white crip fat queer immigrant (blind, bi, trans man, live in the UK).

I have a linguistics degree I only use recreationally.

I'm more likely to accept your follow request if we've talked at least a bit.

fields.name: Header
fields.value: Do not get lost in a sea of despair. Be hopeful, be optimistic. Our struggle is not the struggle of a day, a week, a month, or a year, it is the struggle of a lifetime. Never, ever be afraid to make some noise and get in good trouble.
